price: 25. Gefafkoodii dartood baa loo harqiyey, Naarna loo geliyay, marka ma helin cid u soo gargaarta Alle sokadi.
arabic: مِّمَّا خَطِيٓـَٰٔتِهِمۡ أُغۡرِقُواْ فَأُدۡخِلُواْ نَارٗا فَلَمۡ يَجِدُواْ لَهُم مِّن دُونِ ٱللَّهِ أَنصَارٗا

version.title: Somali translation - Jacob
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur'an into the Somali language, translated by Abdullah Hasan Jacob.

meta.transliteration: mimmā khaṭīātihim ugh'riqū fa-ud'khilū nāran falam yajidū lahum min dūni al-lahi anṣāran
